Until this is done the gold must be subject to such orders as the Courts of the United Kingdom may pronounce in accordance with the usual judicial procedure. So far as we are concerned, the first stop to securing this end is obviously to bring a small parcel of gold to this country as a baBis for a test action, xou asked me what we would be prepared to do in the event of this course being taken, and (a) of the title to the gold being definitely established in this country and accepted elsewhere, or (b) in the event of a decision being given by a Court of First Instance only, in the United Kingdom, that the title of the Russian Soviet Government to the gold cannot be competently disputed.
